name: Le temps des Escargots
description:
Install instructionsWindows

Download zip, and execute "Le Temps Des Escargots.exe"

Arch Linux

(note that this is the git version, might be unstable but is always up to date)

yay -Sy le-temps-des-escargots-git Other Linux

Other OS
